page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...(ctd)
page.content: {10.50a.m.}It is Creative Arts and I have woodwork for two lessons which finishes at 12 noon. {Noon }I meet my Mum and we go to the chip shop for a curry and chips. We go home to eat. I start back for school at 12.55p.m. {1.05p.m.}I go to registration. {1.10p.m.}After dinner I have one more lesson of woodwork. At 1.50p.m. I have a single lesson of music. {2.25p.m.}There is a break for ten minutes. {2.35p.m.}I have two lessons of Humanities lasting for one hour and ten minutes.At 3.45p.m. we leave for home. {3.55p.m.}By now I am at home and eating my tea of sandwiches and cake. I watch television until 5.00p.m. {5.00p.m.}I go out to have a game of tennis, cricket or a game of soccer
